interface.name: rhgb_stub
interface.summary: RHGB stub interface. No access allowed.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rhgb_getpgid
interface.summary: Get the process group of rhgb.

interface.name: rhgb_rw_stream_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write to unix stream sockets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rhgb_dontaudit_rw_stream_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write rhgb unix domain stream sockets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rhgb_stream_connect
interface.summary: Connected to rhgb unix stream socket.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rhgb_rw_shm
interface.summary: Read and write to rhgb shared memory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rhgb_use_ptys
interface.summary: Read from and write to the rhgb devpts.

interface.name: rhgb_dontaudit_use_ptys
interface.summary: dontaudit Read from and write to the rhgb devpts.

interface.name: rhgb_rw_tmpfs_files
interface.summary: Read and write to rhgb temporary file system.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
